query:
SELECT 
  up.topicId,
  t.title as topic_title,
  up.status,
  up.score,
  up.completedAt,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM questions WHERE topicId = up.topicId) as total_questions,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question_progress qp WHERE qp.userId = up.userId AND qp.topicId = up.topicId) as answered_questions
FROM user_progress up
JOIN users u ON up.userId = u.id
JOIN topics t ON up.topicId = t.id
WHERE u.email = 'testyou@me.com' AND up.courseId = 30002
ORDER BY up.topicId;

FROM user_progress up
JOIN users u ON up.userId = u.id
JOIN topics t ON up.topicId = t.id

ORDER BY up.topicId;
